title: Let them come with rain
creator_credit: United Nations Television, George Movshon, Bill Brind and Martin Bunnel
brief_description: Botawana, land-locked in southern Africa, is now taking the painful early steps towards modern nationhood. Much of Botswana is the Kalahari Desert, Botswana’s new leaders look to their vast mineral resources from which to gain a key to the industrial future her people want.
